channel.title: Archaeology on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Archaeology on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: Emergency Data Management for Cultural Heritage Rescue â€“ KulturGutRetter
item.description: The KulturGutRetter project demonstrates how QField enables efficient cultural heritage rescue operations through mobile GIS technology, offline data collection, and real-time coordination during emergency missions.

item.title: QField for Archaeology and Anthropology
item.description:
What you can do

  • Site surveys and contexts
  • Ethnographic mapping and interviews
  • Monitoring and conservation

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare projects in QGIS and collaborate across teams via QFieldCloud.

item.title: QField for Cultural Heritage and Archaeology
item.description:
What you can do

  • Heritage inventories and condition surveys
  • Excavation context and finds recording
  • Monitoring and conservation activities

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare layers and forms in QGIS and sync via QFieldCloud to collaborate across teams.
